Enumeration Type Documentation

enum mamaIoType

IO Types.

Note not all implementations support all mamaIoTypes.

Enumerator:
MAMA_IO_READ 

the socket is readable

MAMA_IO_WRITE 

the socket is writable

MAMA_IO_CONNECT 

the socket is connected

MAMA_IO_ACCEPT 

the socket accepted a connection

MAMA_IO_CLOSE 

the socket was closed

MAMA_IO_ERROR 

an error occurred

MAMA_IO_EXCEPT 

An exceptional event like out of band data occurred.

Function Documentation

typedef void ( MAMACALLTYPE *  mamaIoCb  ) 

Prototype for callback invoked by IO handler.

Parameters:
[in] io The mamaIo handle.
[in] ioType The mamaIoType for the event.
[in] closure Caller supplied closure.
MAMAExpDLL mama_status mamaIo_create ( mamaIo *  result,
mamaQueue  queue,
uint32_t  descriptor,
mamaIoCb  action,
mamaIoType  ioType,
void *  closure 
)

Create a IO handler.

If the underlying infrastructure does not support the requested mamaIoType, mamaIo_create returns MAMA_STATUS_UNSUPPORTED_IO_TYPE. For example RV only supports READ, WRITE, and EXCEPT. LBM supports all types except ERROR.

Parameters:
[in] result A pointer to the io handle.
[in] queue The event queue for the io events. NULL specifies the Mama default queue.
[in] action The callback to be invoked when an event occurs.
[in] descriptor Wait for IO on this descriptor.
[in] ioType Wait for occurrences of this type.
[in] closure The closure that is passed to the callback.
Returns:
mama_status return code can be one of: MAMA_STATUS_NULL_ARG MAMA_STATUS_INVALID_QUEUE MAMA_STATUS_NO_BRIDGE_IMPL MAMA_STATUS_OK
MAMAExpDLL mama_status mamaIo_getDescriptor ( mamaIo  io,
uint32_t *  d 
)

Get the IO descriptor.

Parameters:
[in] io The mamaIo handle.
[out] d The associated descriptor for the mamaIO handle.
Returns:
mama_status return code can be one of: MAMA_STATUS_NULL_ARG MAMA_STATUS_INVALID_ARG MAMA_STATUS_NO_BRIDGE_IMPL
MAMAExpDLL mama_status mamaIo_destroy ( mamaIo  io  ) 

Destroy the IO.

Parameters:
[in] io The mamaIo handle to be destroyed.
Returns:
mama_status return code can be one of: MAMA_STATUS_NULL_ARG MAMA_STATUS_NO_BRIDGE_IMPL MAMA_STATUS_INVALID_ARG MAMA_STATUS_OK
